price: Maze wa mwemeramana mu bantu ba Firawuni, yishura ahanura yongera agabisha ati: “Jewe mu vy’ukuri, mfise ubwoba n’impungenge, ko mu gihe mwohirahira mukica Musa, mwoshikirwa n’ibihano nk’ivyashikiye imigwi y’abiyunze mu kurwanya Intumwa;
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī āmana yāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum mith'la yawmi al-aḥzābi
